name: Swamp Lily
description: The Swamp Lily is a medium-sized plant creature with a unique appearance that aids in its deceptive tactics, capable of charming foes with illusory feasts.
memorable: Known for its ability to charm and incapacitate adventurers, drawing them into traps with its illusory feasts.
goals: Manipulate and incapacitate creatures in swamp environments through charm and deception.
relations: Often found in swampy areas, potentially coexisting with other swamp creatures.
environment: Swamps and marshes, utilizing the environment to enhance its deceptive abilities.
strengths: Possesses strong charm abilities, good hit points, and damage immunities.
weaknesses: Limited movement speed of 15 feet, making it vulnerable to fast opponents.
attacks: Two melee root attacks dealing bludgeoning damage, with additional poison damage on a failed save.
most_powerful_ability: The Fake Feast, creating an illusory banquet that chars creatures who approach.
senses: Has tremorsense up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect movements of nearby creatures.
additional_information: Condition immunities to blinded, deafened, and poisoned.
Can read surface thoughts of creatures within 60 feet regarding food preferences.
Charms creatures, incapacitating them and compelling them to move towards the illusion.
Maintains the illusion with a bonus action each turn.
test_queries: plant creature that creates illusory feasts
deceptive plant living in the swamp
slow-moving plant with multiple root attacks
